TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MergeOption extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Determines the synchronization option for sending or receiving entities to or from WCF Data Services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This value is used when materializing objects. Set this property to the appropriate materialization option before executing any queries or updates to the data service. The default value is `MergeOption.AppendOnly`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Services.Client.MergeOption AppendOnly = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Append new entities only. Existing entities or their original values will not be modified. No client-side changes are lost in this merge. This is the default behavior.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Services.Client.MergeOption NoTracking = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Objects are always loaded from persisted storage. Any property changes made to objects in the object context are overwritten by the data source values.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Services.Client.MergeOption OverwriteChanges = int32(1)

Docs.summary: All current values on the client are overwritten with current values from the data service regardless of whether they have been changed on the client.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Services.Client.MergeOption PreserveChanges = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Current values that have been changed on the client are not modified, but any unchanged values are updated with current values from the data service. No client-side changes are lost in this merge.
